Hi,

I'm using Heritrix 1.12.1.

In a standard frontier report, what does the "active balance" mean?

In the following queue, what's the meaning of the different numbers?

Queue www.abc.com
   986 items
     last enqueued: http://www.abc.com/1.html
       last peeked: http://www.abc.com/2.html
    total expended: 2377 (total budget: 10000)
    active balance: 623
    last(avg) cost: 1(1)

I suppose the total number of items in the queue is 986 (total or still 
left?), the total expended is the budget spent so far (2377, in a 
maximum of 10000, having in mind the cost-policy and the 
queue-total-budget selected). Is this correct?

Thank you.

Best regards,
--
